title: After i Click Launch The Login screen does not come up
body: A day before i was playing good with the 6.24 patch and than i waske up this morning and i've been trying to fix it but i don't know what it is already tried deleting files HTC and more but nothing seems to work please help{{item:3026}}

replies.body: This could be a security setting issue by either your OS or some program that's blocking the client from launching.  Try the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as a first step to restore that access.  Let me know if you have questions!
i did all of them but it did not do anything, how come i was playing a day ago and now i can't i've been on it for like 5-6 hours but still can't fix it

Your settings can change at anytime for various reasons, like a Windows update or another program getting in the way.  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to us and our tech team can help individually.  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach it to the ticket for a closer look.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
